snippet.title: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 | Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Each year, the Paintress awakens to paint a cursed number upon her monolith, causing those of that age to fade into oblivion. As this number ticks down, more lives are erased, and the shadows of death loom ever closer to those who remain. This cycle must end.

Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 is a reactive turn-based RPG inspired by the lavish art and culture of France’s Belle Époque. You will step into the shoes of Gustave and his fellow Expeditioners, the brave souls determined to end the Paintress’ reign of death. Together, they will traverse breathtaking landscapes, encountering both deadly adversaries and powerful allies. 

We at Sandfall Interactive have poured our hearts into creating this game. We invite you to explore this beautiful, melancholic world and discover the depths of its stories and battles in 2025.

Wishlist Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 and follow us on Social Media to stay up to date with the release. We can’t wait to share more of this journey with you.

Discover more and wishlist: https://www.expedition33.com/linkhub
